dublinCore.dc:title: 118 HR 3356 IH: Motor Carrier Safety Screening Modernization Act
dublinCore.dc:rights: Pursuant to Title 17 Section 105 of the United States Code, this file is not subject to copyright protection and is in the public domain.

action.action-desc: Mr. Graves of Louisiana (for himself and Ms. Davids of Kansas) introduced the following bill; which was referred to the Committee on Transportation and Infrastructure

form.official-title: To amend title 49, United States Code, with respect to employment screening for the motor carrier industry, and for other purposes.

section.text: This Act may be cited as the Motor Carrier Safety Screening Modernization Act.
Section 31150 of title 49, United States Code, is amended—

paragraph.text: in subsection (a) by striking preemployment and inserting employment; and

subparagraph.text: by striking a preemployment and inserting an employment; and
by striking the preemployment and inserting the employment.
